"A.D.2028/4/7/20:00": "OH MY GOD! My STAGE! It's falling... apart?"
"But, it's GOOD... It's all GOOD! Hitsugi-GIRL, Enga-BOY... and <%me>!"
"When ACTORS have exeeded the director's expectations - That's when the greatest film is born!"
"Geez, even in these circumstances, you still care about your movie, don't you?"
"<%me>...? Big bro, over there!！"
"Since we were told to come with everyone, I was 50% optimistic about who's here but... Every one of you looks 70% finished."
"And that midget over there is Hitsugi, right? She looks 100% arrogant. Phul, let's just kill her right here."
"You can't do that Och. Even though she looks weak,  we only came here to greet them."
"Ah, that phrase, \"only came here to greet them\", sounds strong. I could use this! Have to take a memo."
"Hoho, Phul is right, Och. This time, our target isn't them."
"Detected readings! 5 detected! How long have they been there?!"
"Come on, gimme a break. They're all here? This might turn out pretty bad..."
"Looks like you've got beaten pretty bad, Bethor. That's what happens when you don't follow our advice."
"HA... You didn't come alllll the way out here just to say that, RO? Right, Ophiel?"
"Exactly right."
"Mother has enforced this judgement. Destructive acts without consent, and failure to complete the mission. It's something we can't turn a blind eye on."
"I'm simply following that decision, Bethor."
"He... haha... ha... Gah! OK! OKAAAY! If that's Mother's decision, then that's fine!"
"However, Ophiel... The film's still rolling, right?"
"The scene of someone's death... is something that you can only film once in a lifetime! Record it... without missing any moment!"
"...Our mission has been completed."
"To the world! I'll only say this once."
"We, Mother Cluster's, only target is the custody of a child named Aru. We'll guarantee the safety of the Earthlings, if you hand him over."
"Earthlings... Just us? What's going to happen to the people in the Oracle?!"
"I'm only here to broadcast Mother's words. If you don't hand him over, then I'll take everything back. That's all."
"Hand Aru over... What do they mean by that? What do they... What does Mother want to accomplish?!"
"Revenge, of course... There shouldn't be anything else other than revenge."
"Change The World!"
"世界変革の声"
